pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw: I looked into the skyx deletion problem and noticed that it may not be thread-safe. I made some changes in [worldless_7_ian](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/worldless_7_ian%0Dworldless_7#diff) to run the test in the rendering thread and the test now passes. Take a look and see if the changes are ok
content.html: I looked into the skyx deletion problem and noticed that it may not be thread-safe. I made some changes in worldless_7_ian to run the test in the rendering thread and the test now passes. Take a look and see if the changes are ok

pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw:
It looks like deleting the sky is segfaulting on Xenial but passing on Trusty (we can see that the test passes on [Jenkins](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/824/)).

So this doesn't get blocked too long, I ticketed issue #2118 and skipped the sky deletion on 9f38ec1 for now.
content.html:
It looks like deleting the sky is segfaulting on Xenial but passing on Trusty (we can see that the test passes on Jenkins).

So this doesn't get blocked too long, I ticketed issue #2118 and skipped the sky deletion on 9f38ec1 for now.
